name: Color Jump
description:
Color Jump is surely one of the simplest games you've ever seen, of course, it will also be one of the most difficult.It may seem easy by its name, by its captures or by its style, but we assure you that it is even difficult to reach 10 points. You will have to play a lot if you want to raise high scores, and still require 100% of your concentration and 100% of your ability.

In this game you will handle the ball with your mouse, and your goal is simple: reach as high as possible. To ascend you will support yourself on moving platforms that will disappear after the first touch, you will not be able to take a breath!
There lies the difficulty, because apart from the frantic and forced movement of the ball, the platforms move. It is a very fun and addictive game.



Some features:

- Simple one touch game

- Addictive and endless fun game-play.

- 2D Flat design.

-Good simple style
